title: Shadows of Stars
description: "You Wielders believe yourselves to be children of the stars, but you are darkness - shadows sent down to cast our world into oblivion."After a terrible act of evil, the small island of Acadia has built a towering black wall, closing the city off from the mainland. For seven long years, Wielders are feared and hunted inside the impenetrable walls for the incredible gifts that they possess. Now, three young Wielders hold the power to change everything.Marina, determined to save her brother, can't rein in the ice she manipulates. Adira, only just discovering her overwhelming abilities, is fighting for freedom. Soren, still connected to a girl whose life he helped tear apart, is struggling to unearth a sliver of the humanity that was stolen from him.Set in a modern era fantasy world, these three intertwining stories culminate into a tale of strength, discovery, and doing anything to save the ones you love.
author: Kim Vale
